objects.text: • EXCEPTIONAL IMAGE QUALITY • DURABLE METAL CONSTRUCTION • CREATIVE EXPRESSION

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Unleash Your Creative Vision
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with modern technology
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Versatile tilting LCD screen for creative compositions
• Advanced autofocus system for precise subject tracking
• Multiple manual control dials for professional operation
• Compatible with Fujinon X-mount lens system
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for precise framing
• Compact and lightweight design for portable photography
• Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Film simulation modes for creative expression
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Excellent low-light performance
• Weather-sealed body for durability

banner_details:
This banner showcases an eye-catching promotional design for a professional camera. A dark, radial gradient background establishes a sleek, modern aesthetic, emphasizing the central product image ("product_image")–a high-quality camera. The main title text ("heading") is bold and center-aligned in white at the top, drawing immediate attention. Just beneath, a vibrant red subheader ("subheading") adds emphasis to the camera's premium features. A red circular badge contains the price element ("price"), contrasting sharply against the background to capture attention. Below the image, a concise statement of key features ("description") is displayed in white. The call-to-action ("cta") sits in a bold red button ("cta_background") at the bottom center.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #121212 (black), #2A2A2A, #242424
- Primary Text: #FFFFFF (white)
- Accent: #E63946 (red), #C1121F, #FF4D4D
- Stroke: #444, #666
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, showcasing a sleek, professional aesthetic primarily built around a deep matte black (#1A1A1A) body. The camera lens reflects highlights with subtle metallic grays and silvers (#555555, #A8A8A8), giving it a modern industrial look. The text and dials contain sharp white accents (#FFFFFF) for clarity and contrast. Hints of red (#FF3C3C) and orange (#FFA500) used in lens markings add subtle vibrancy without overpowering the monochrome theme. The smooth blending of matte black with reflective metallic surfaces highlights the camera’s premium feel, making it suitable for an advertisement banner with a bold, minimalist color palette.
